Pre-Game Insights: Washington aims to break its three-game slide with a victory against Philadelphia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards are 5-17 in Eastern Conference play
The 76ers are shooting 44.7% from the field this season, 2.6 percentage points lower than the 47.3% the Wizards allow to opponents.
The Wizards' 44.6% shooting percentage from the field this season is 3.4 percentage points lower than the 76ers have given up to their opponents (48.0%).
Others: Tyrese Maxey is scoring 25.4 points per game with 3.3 rebounds and 5.6 assists for the 76ers.
Bilal Coulibaly is shooting 42.9% and averaging 12.8 points for the Wizards.
The 76ers are 2-1 in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
The Wizards have a 2-26 record in games decided by 10 or more points.
The 76ers have given up 48.0% shooting to opponents.
The 76ers are 6-4 in their last 10 games, averaging 110.9 points, 39.3 rebounds, 22.7 assists, 10.7 steals and 4.4 blocks per game while shooting 45.7% from the field.
The Wizards are 3-7 in their last 10 games, averaging 113.5 points, 46.2 rebounds, 27.0 assists, 7.0 steals and 5.0 blocks per game while shooting 46.2% from the field.
The 76ers have several players out due to injury, including Joel Embiid, Jared McCain, Andre Drummond, Kyle Lowry, and Paul George.
The Wizards have several players out due to injury, including Saddiq Bey, Jordan Poole, Marvin Bagley III, Malcolm Brogdon, and Kyle Kuzma.
